A Goal Without A Plan

Is Just A Wish

Advance Planning

As your advisor, we are not putting forth just any investment strategy, but the strategy that is designed to fit your life best. Meeting your requirements for capital growth, income or wealth preservation – while being mindful of your attitude toward risk – is our objective. You can expect a portfolio that is individually customized to reflect the future as you envision it.

Individuals have a variety of different goals. Whether it’s more traveling, giving to charity or even launch a business, you need a well-conceived plan to succeed. Pursuing financial independence is no different. Whether you’re looking to grow your money over time, generate income in retirement or preserve wealth for future generations, confidence in your financial plan comes with knowing your assets are invested well. As your knowledgeable partner, we provide wide-ranging, comprehensive financial planning with which to chart a detailed course for pursuing a bright and secure future.

At Armis Financial, we know that financial planning may be broad or focused based on your needs. If you have ever asked your self these questions, let's get acquainted.

  • Which investments should I choose for my 401(k)?
  • Which of my employee benefits do I need to take advantage of?
  • Can I afford to send my kids to a great college?
  • I'm an independent contractor and need to set up benefits and a retirement plan. What should I do?
  • How do I counter-punch all these enormous taxes I pay?
  • Will my family be ok if I “kick the bucket” early in life or become disabled?
  • Will I be able to retire?
  • How much income will you need in retirement?
  • Are you spending too much in fees?
  • Is your asset allocation appropriate given your financial goals?
  • Does your income support your spending/saving goals?
  • How should you prioritize debt payments?

If you wan't answer to these questions then click on the link below to get started!

Let's Start
Let's Begin Step Two!

Are you ready to begin step two of the Armis Approach?

This means we are ready to gather information and ask about your current financial state of affairs so I can get a clear picture of where you are today.

You can be as specific as you want, if you want to leave some stuff out, that is ok. However, the more specific you are, the better Financial Plan I can build for you. After you finish inputting your information I will send you and email to invite you to fill out our Risk Profile Questionnaire. Then I can fully analyze and develop your Financial Plan that is tailored to you!

Interactive Brokers is a member of the Securities Investor Protection Corporation (SIPC), which provides funds to meet claims up to a ceiling of $500,000, including a maximum of $250,000 for cash claims. For additional information regarding SIPC coverage, including a brochure, please contact SIPC at (202) 371‐8300 or visit www.sipc.org.
